work.name: Infusense
work.summary: Revitalized and successfully delivered a critical project by assuming responsibility from previous developers and transforming an incomplete system into a fully functional and robust solution.

work.name: Code for Fun
work.summary: Taught High School students Python, Javascript, Ruby, and SQL in an open classroom environment.

awards.title: GitLab Hero

references.name: Joshue Osuna
references.reference: Ted is a top-tier software engineer with an incredible work ethic. He's not only technically skilled but also a great team player who can simplify complex concepts for everyone. Ted consistently meets deadlines and often goes the extra mile to exceed project expectations. His professionalism and commitment to quality make him an asset to any team. Highly recommended for any software project.

projects.name: Catris
projects.summary: Tetris, but with cats! My girlfriend and I had a blast, goofing around and creating this cat-astrophe.
